text:
UNIVERSITY C
DEPARTMENT OF RADIO AND TELEVISION BROADCASTING
GENERAL EXTENSION DIVISION
December 19, 1961
MINNEAPOLIS 14
Mr. William G. Harley, President
National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue N.W.
Washington 6, D.C.
Dear Bill:
I of course was very glad to receive your note of December 11,
informing me that I had been elected to the NAEB Board of Directors.
After having been elected to three terms as secretary, two as vice
president, two as president, and one as Board member, I sometimes
felt lonesome without a closer NAEB relationship. But no longer.â€™
With best personal regards,
Yours sincerely
Burton Paulu
Director of Radio and
Television Broadcasting
